about_the_game:
Descent: The Dark Corridors is a first-person horror game.
Terror, chases and terrifying creatures in this atmospheric horror game. But no matter what happens, never be left alone in the dark.



You are Daith, you wake up in an unknown and very bad-looking place, you don't remember how you got there. As you explore the spooky paths, you must overcome obstacles to continue advancing on that horrible journey. A disturbing odyssey into the dark corners of the human mind awaits you.

But don't worry, you'll be alone down there... or not?
